column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers

column.name: CM_GROUP_ID
column.comment: Kind of  common market group.

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: CM_GROUP_TYPE
column.comment: Kind of  common market group. - Reference key to reference table GROUP_TYPE characterizing the kind of group (logical foreign key).

column.name: CM_GROUP_NICKNAME
column.comment: Nickname for the common market group. - A nickname for the group so that customer can easier identify his group.

column.name: CM_OWNER_BAN
column.comment: Indication of the customer's billing account number. The customer is the (natural or legal) person to whom services are made available on the basis of a contract concluded with D2-Vodafone. The customer is responsible for payment for the services used by himself or by other participants belonging to him. If the customer account is assigned to a higher-level account (consolidated account), the higher-level account can also be responsible for payment. - Owner Ban

column.name: CM_OWNER_SUB_NO
column.comment: Subscriber number - Owner GSM subscriber number or FN Number.

column.name: CNT_SEQ_NO
column.comment: An attribute that maintains the sequential number incremented for each row of subscriber.  This field is for processes like CSM_TRANSACTION. S - Contract sequence number referring to contract related to corresponding 24 month Owner SOC.

column.name: DEALER_CODE
column.comment: Dealer code. - Dealer Code of dealer who created group.

column.name: LAST_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: The last time the record was changed - Last update date

column.name: LAST_ACTIVITY
column.comment: last activity applied on the record. - Last activity applied on the group like creation of group, create/expire group

column.name: LAST_UPDATE_CHANNEL
column.comment: update chanel - Identifies the update channel  e.g. CSM Online, EPOS, MyVodafone, IVR,.....

column.name: NUM_EFF_MEMBERS
column.comment: Number of effective members - Number of effective members

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: effective change date

column.name: EXPIRATION_DATE
column.comment: Expiry Date

column.name: COMMUNITY_ID
column.comment: Community ID

column.name: IN_ACT_IND
column.comment: N/A
